root.message: The QUALITY_ASSMNT field for indicator 1-3-1a, translated into all languages

languages.language: The final assessment of the quality of social protection information is carried out by the Public Finance, Actuarial and Statistics Unit of the ILO's Social Protection Department. This process follows the standard quality criteria established by the ILO Department of Statistics. In case of doubts about the quality of specific data, these values are reviewed with the participation of the national agencies responsible for producing social protection data. If the issues cannot be clarified, the respective information is not published.
